text: Tim Lo Duca (born 17 December 1985) is a Slovenian footballer who plays for FC Erhart Preding. ==Career== Lo Duca began his senior career in Primorje. He was signed by Domžale on 18 February 2006. He was loaned for six months to Livar, from January 2008 to June 2008. In July 2008, he signed a contract with Rudar Velenje. ==External links== *Player profile at PrvaLiga Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tolmin Category:Slovenian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Slovenian PrvaLiga players Category:Slovenian Second League players Category:NK Primorje players Category:NK Domžale players Category:NK Ivančna Gorica players Category:NK Nafta Lendava players Category:NK Rudar Velenje players Category:Slovenian expatriate footballers Category:Slovenian expatriate sportspeople in Austria Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria Category:Slovenia youth international footballers Category:Slovenia under-21 international footballers
title: Tim Lo Duca
